none:
Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on June 02, 2017 Description from Terminal Escape:
Two killer demos one one killer tape. The third freakout weirdo release from Germany's PISSE, Kohlrübenwinter is such a gloriously chilled out approach to a particularly appealing brand of outsider punk, and it is predictably a favorite at TEHQ. The general vibe is ultra '80s new wave, but the approach is still punk, and it still has teeth. The stomper "Schwätzer" takes the caketape for this listener, but there are zero legitimate bummers contained on this cassette...you know you like this shit, so dig in.  KOHLRÜBENWINTER
https://pisse.bandcamp.com/ https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-FHLS2vx15NY/WTD94gGrTrI/AAAAAAAARBQ/4JNL5NIU2iQZEd9wbV0RyxOPwqZoGPpBgCLcB/s1600/Kohlrubenwinter%2Bimg%2Bcopy.jpg

seo.title: Pisse - Kohlrübenwinter (#1 & #2) - Terminal Escape
